notesStmt.note: Damaged by damp and mould, repaired before rebinding. Losses infilled and weak areas silked. Worming. Usage stains and mould spotting.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
